alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 24 at 9:16PM CST until December 25 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds of 25 to 35 mph with gusts to around 45 mph are occurring over southeast Kansas into far southwest Missouri. Joplin this past hour recorded a gust to 43 mph with 35 mph winds witnessed into the Monett area. * WHERE...In Kansas, Cherokee County. In Missouri, Jasper, Greene, Newton, Lawrence, Christian, McDonald, Barry and Stone Counties. * WHEN...Through 3 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
